sentence.Network_en: Members can blackball candidates in secret ballots.
sentence.Network_cn: 成员可以通过无记名投票反对候选人加入。

sentence.Network_en: Will you blackball her if she tries to join our club?
sentence.Network_cn: 假如她要参加我们的俱乐部,你是否投反对票?

sentence.Network_en: Lawrence Talbot: I module blackball every of you!
sentence.Network_cn: 劳伦斯?塔尔博特: “我要杀死你们! ”

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...色的词，我们可以参见：black tea(红茶)；black coffee(不加牛奶和糖的浓咖啡)；blackball(秘密反对票)；black letter(倒霉的)；black sheep（害群之马，败家子）；blackbird.
Will you blackball her if she tries to join our club ?, 假如她要参加我们的俱乐部 , 你是否投反对票?

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: from the practice of registering an adverse vote by placing a black ball in a ballot box

entry.tran: 投票反对（某人）加入俱乐部
entry.def: If the members of a club blackball someone, they vote against that person being allowed to join their club.

example.ex: Members can blackball candidates in secret ballots.
example.tran: 成员可以通过无记名投票反对候选人加入。

means.word_mean: 1. the act of excluding someone by a negative vote or veto
1. expel from a community or group
2. vote against; refuse to endorse; refuse to assent;
